thread.title: Beautifil spacious room- front desk not very friendly
thread.title_full: Beautifil spacious room- front desk not very friendly - Review of Blue Moon Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Stephanie E
title: Beautifil spacious room- front desk not very friendly
text:
My boyfriend and I booked hotel on hotel tonight, we didn't get to hotel till about 10 pm as we were in Staten Island visiting friends. When we got there we were told we had to wait for a room?! What? I guess the front desk guy was covering for his friend who went and got take out. I was a little annoyed as we had to wait about 15 min and we had to be some where to meet friends. Also we asked for late check out and he said he couldn't help us.
However the room was Huge! beautiful spacious patio. Very unique hotel. I would go back based on location and room size but felt front desk really didn't care at all.
